trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type=hidden>" name="<input type=hidden>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático para HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type=hidden>" name="<input type=hidden>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: You can use the HtmlInputHidden control to embed information that is hidden from the user within a `<form>` element.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o controle Image para inserir informações ocultas do usuário dentro de um `<form>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: This information is sent when the Web page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações são enviadas quando a página da Web é postada para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputHidden control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O controle Image fornece um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>evento que é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>valores entre postagens para o servidor de alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você crie um manipulador de eventos que executa um conjunto personalizado de instruções de cada vez que o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HtmlInputHidden control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Image o controle não oferece uma maneira interna volta para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> control, to send the value of the control back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Você deve fornecer outro controle na página da Web que oferece suporte ao envio para o servidor, como um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>controle, para enviar o valor do controle de volta para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ASP.NET page framework uses this HTML feature to automatically load and persist the view state of server controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Estrutura da página no ASP.NET usa esse recurso HTML para carregar automaticamente e manter o estado de exibição de controles de servidor em uma página.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputHidden, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do Image, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "hidden" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| A cadeia de caracteres literal "oculta". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de postagem para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks to see whether the postback value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control is different from the previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método de LoadPostData verifica se o valor de postback do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controle é diferente do valor anterior e, em caso afirmativo, retorna `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de LoadPostData é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de chave para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> estado do controle foi alterado como resultado de postback; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is called just prior to rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPreRender é chamado antes do processamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPreRender é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você manipule o evento diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>propriedade é alterada no servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>evento funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnServerChange também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*>método para sinalizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> controle o estado do controle é alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RaisePostDataChangedEvent é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle para estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> atributos do controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém o fluxo de saída para renderizar no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*> property is changed on the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*>propriedade é alterada no servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is changed between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O evento ServerChange é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>propriedade é alterada entre postagens para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o evento ServerChange funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.LoadPostData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <> </> *> método de interface chamando o <> </> *> método.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de chave para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden"> </xref> estado do controle foi alterado como resultado de postback; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <> </> *> método de interface chamando o <> </> *> método.
